name: Kärcher Pressure Washer K1700, CETA Certified, 3 Spray Nozzles, Detergent Tank, for Cars, Driveways, Siding, Patios, 1.2 max. GPM
short_description: Powerful & CETA Certified: 1700 PSI TruPressure and 1.2 GPM for effective cleaning of various surfaces. Independently tested and CETA certified for proven performance you can trust.
Versatile Cleaning Options: Equipped with three different nozzles (15°, turbo, and 65°), the K1700 allows you to tackle a wide range of cleaning jobs with precision
User-Friendly Operation: An on/off foot switch provides back-friendly operation, and the unit automatically stops when the trigger is released. A 0.5 gal detergent tank makes cleaning even easier
Effortless Maneuverability: Featuring never-flat wheels, the K1700 can be easily transported across various terrains for convenient use around your property
The Kärcher Promise - Cleaner. Quicker: The K1700 power washer is perfect for cleaning pavement, patios, decks, cars, homes, fencing, and much more
product_description: The Kärcher K1700 is a versatile electric pressure washer ideal for all-around cleaning. With a 1700 PSI CETA™ certified TruPressure™ output and a GPM of 1.2, this power washer is easy to use for any homeowner and offers convenient features for efficient cleaning. The kit includes three different spray nozzles with a universal quick-connect fitting: a 15° nozzle for regular cleaning tasks, a turbo nozzle for intense cleaning power, and a 65° soap nozzle for applying detergent and achieving a sparkling finish. The integrated detergent tank on the top of the unit makes it easy to apply your favorite pressure washer detergents. For added convenience, the detergent tank is removable to fill and clean when needed. Thanks to the three different nozzles, the K1700 can be used to clean cars, patios, fencing, decks, and much more. The integrated storage container on the back of the unit keeps the trigger gun, hose, and spray wand securely stored away while not in use, ensuring everything stays organized. The nozzles can be secured on the handle when not in use, so you never misplace one ever again. Keep the power cord neatly organized using the cord wrap on the handle, where you can also store the power plug. The portable power washer features never-flat tires, so you can transport and use the unit anywhere on your property. No tools are needed for the assembly of the K1700, so you can start cleaning as soon as it arrives. The on/off foot switch provides easy power control, allowing you to turn the pressure washer on and off with a simple tap of your foot. Water flow is controlled separately through the trigger gun. This set includes the K1700, a pressure washer gun, a spray wand, a 15° nozzle, a 65° nozzle, a turbo nozzle, an adapter for 3/4" garden hose, a removable detergent tank, and a M22 18 ft. pressure washer hose.

name: 5000PSI Electric Pressure Washer - 2025 New Electric Power Washer with Upgraded 33ft Pressure Washer Hose Reel, Foam Cannon, 4 Nozzle Set, Power Washer for House/Patios/Car/Fence, Orange
short_description: 【OUTSTANGING POWER WAHSER】Powerful 1600-WATT motor generates up to 5000PSI & 3.0GPM of water flow, covering a larger area in a shorter time, making cleaning more efficient. Even the most stubborn grime quickly and effortlessly

【UPRGAED EXTENSION HOSE】 The 33-foot extended hose is made from enduring, thick rubber that's flexible and resistant to damage and leaks. The 33ft pressure hose with 16ft power cord to meet your extensive cleaning needs

【UPGRADED TWO-WAY FITTING】 Our metal two-way fitting of hose reel is not easy to rust, deformation and freezing. The hose connector model: M22*14mm, hose contains O-ring (inner diameter 9*2.65mm)), solving the leakage problem fundamentally

【ENHANCED MACHINE DESIGN】The front end of the base has been widened. Since the internal pump of most high pressure washers is heavier at the back, causing them to tip over easily when moved, we've thickened and widened the front end to balance the center of gravity

【4 QUICK CONNECT NOZZLES & FOAM CANNON】4 quick connect nozzles (0°, 15°, 25°, 40°). 0° powerful blasting is suitable for impact cracks. 15° focus washing is suitable for cleaning hard surfaces. 25° general cleaning is suitable for cleaning of fences. 40° uniform spraying is suitable for clean of cars, etc. The car wash foam gun can achieve foaming effect in an instant. Thicker and dense foam stays on the surface longer for better cleaning performance

【VERSATILE】Our electric pressure washers are suitable for all kinds of cleaning occasions: sidewalks, cracks, metal, concrete, fences, cars, furniture, windows, and more. And our portable pressure washer can move to any place
【WHAT YOU WILL GET】5000PSI Electric pressure washer, 33ft extened pressure hose, 500ML detergent tank, a garden adapter, 4 degree Pressure nozzles, cleaning pin, a manual and our sweet-heart service

【commowner SERVICE】Backed by 2-Year Limited Service, Labor, and Parts Coverage with Customer Service. If you have any issues with the compatibility between your existing accessories and our pressure washer, please get in touch with us

Note: The machine's pressure rating is the maximum value obtained through testing in a controlled laboratory environment without any external influencing factors. In actual use, factors such as faucet location, hose length, and nozzle type may cause variations.

name: Westinghouse ePX3050 Electric Pressure Washer, 2100 Max PSI 1.76 Max GPM with Foam Cannon, for Cars/Fences/Driveways/Home/Patios
short_description: Powerful Performance: Max 2100 PSI and Max 1.76 GPM of powerful, deep-cleaning water pressure perfect for decks, sidewalks, siding, fences, railings, garage floors, exterior walls, cars and patio furniture – comes with a soap applicator accessory
Durable Design: Powerful AC 120V electric motor Long-lasting, maintenance free axial pump with auto stop provides a max of 1.76 gallons of water a minute
User-Friendly & Compact: Solid construction with low 26″ profile, 5” never-flat wheels and 35’ GFCI cord provides easy transportation and maneuverability
Comes Ready to Clean- 20′ foot abrasion resistant super-flex hose with lightweight high pressure spray gun and wand and 2 quick connect nozzles (15°, 25°)

Performance & Peace of Mind: All Westinghouse pressure washers are functionally tested in the factory and are backed by our 2-year Limited Warranty and lifetime technical support, backed by our Nationwide Westinghouse Service Network
Versatile Design: Compatible with pressure washer accessories such as surface cleaners, undercarriage cleaners, and foam cannons with M22 fittings
product_description: The Westinghouse ePX3050 Electric Pressure Washer, with Max 2100 PSI and Max 1.76 GPM, is designed to tackle your toughest cleaning jobs the ease of electric. Built with a powerful AC 120V electric motor and a maintenance free axial cam pump with auto stop, the ePX3050 has the versatility to handle a variety of situations and surfaces including brick, stone, concrete, wood, aluminum, and iron. The compact design, 14 pound net weight, 5 inch never-flat wheels and 35’ GFCI cord offer easy mobility and maneuverability, allowing you to get into those hard-to-reach places with the toughest grime. Make all your deep-cleaning projects easier than ever before with the Westinghouse ePX3050 Pressure Washer.

name: Westinghouse ePX3500 Electric Pressure Washer, 2500 Max PSI 1.76 Max GPM with Anti-Tipping Technology, Onboard Soap Tank, Pro-Style Steel Wand, 5-Nozzle Set, for Cars/Fences/Driveways/Home/Patios
short_description: 2500 Max PSI (at initial discharge) of Deep-Cleaning Water Pressure and Up To 1.76 GPM (without nozzle at minimum pressure) Water Flow; Pro-Style Steel Extendable 17.5 inch Wand with Quick-Connect Nozzles (0 Degree, 15 Degree, 25 Degree, Turbo, and Soap Applicator)

Super Compact and Lightweight at 16.5” Tall and 19 lb. for Convenient Storage and Portability - Four Quick-Lock Wheels with 360° Steering Design and Low Center of Gravity Engineered for Anti-Tipping Design

Easy-Coil Nylon-Braided 25' hose - 20 oz (600 mL) Onboard Soap Tank to Add Detergents/Chemicals for Heavy-Duty Cleaning Power on Decks, Driveways, Garage Floors, Stairs, Fencing, Patio Furniture, and Vehicles
Pump Automatically Stops when Trigger is Not Engaged to Conserve Energy and Promote Pump and Motor Life
Backed by 3-Year Limited Service, Labor, and Parts Coverage with Nationwide Customer Service and Support Network
product_description: Tackle the toughest grime with the Westinghouse ePX3500 Electric Pressure Washer designed for your most easy and convenient cleaning experience yet. Delivering 2500 max PSI of pressure (at initial discharge) with up to 1.76 GPM of water flow (without nozzle at minimum pressure), this electric pressure washer has the muscle to scrub away mildew, grease, oil, tar, mud, rust, and more for all household surfaces with pure scouring force. Engineered to be perfectly balanced with a low center of gravity at 16.5 in. tall, it utilizes anti-tipping technology with four-wheel steering to dramatically increase comfort of use and maneuverability. With 360° turns, it’ll follow you wherever you go in one smooth motion from driveway to grass to maximize the efficiency of your cleaning tasks. Constructed into a super compact package, tuck it away and pull it out of storage with ease. This electric pressure washer features a pro-style gun with five Quick Connect spray tips, onboard detergent tank, and a flexible 25 ft. easy-coil hose for versatility at your fingertips. Backed by a Total Stop System (TSS) to conserve energy and prolong pump life, the ePX3500 Electric Pressure Washer will keep you blasting away dirt with half the size and all the power.

name: Westinghouse ePX3100v Electric Pressure Washer, 2100 Max PSI 1.76 Max GPM, Built-in Carry Handle, Detachable Foam Cannon, Pro-Style Steel Wand, 3-Nozzle Set, for Cars/Fences/Driveways/Home/Patios

Super Compact and Lightweight at 18 lb. for Convenient Storage and Portability – Built-in Handle for Easy Transportation to Wherever Your Cleaning Tasks Are

product_description: Tackle the toughest grime with the Westinghouse ePX3100v Handheld Electric Pressure Washer designed for your most easy and convenient cleaning experience yet. Delivering 2100 max PSI of pressure (at initial discharge) with up to 1.76 GPM of water flow (without nozzle at minimum pressure), this electric pressure washer has the muscle to scrub away mildew, grease, oil, tar, mud, rust, and more for all household surfaces with pure scouring force. name: AIVOLT Electric Pressure Washer, Anti-Tipping Power Washer Surge Pressure 4800PSI with 36FT Cable & 25FT Hose, 4 Nozzles, Soap Tank, High Pressure Cleaner Machine for Car Washing, House, Garden
short_description: 【Powerful & Efficient Washing Pressure】AIVOLT Pressure Washer delivers professional-grade 2400 PSI for home cleaning needs, with lab-tested surge pressure reaching 4800 PSI. Equipped with a high-performance 1650W motor (8850 RPM), it maintains consistent powerful pressure even during extended use. The 1.76 GPM water flow ensures optimal balance between high pressure and water efficiency, making it ideal for cars, houses, gardens, driveways, patios, and outdoor furniture

【Stable Mobility System】Low center of gravity and square-frame design can effectively prevent tipping over on uneven ground. Four 360° pivoting wheels allow it flexibly move along with you after gentle tug. The extended 25ft high-pressure hose and 36ft power cord provide ample range for outdoor cleaning

【Safety Features】The integrated GFCI provides instant leakage protection. Auto-shutoff Trigger Safety System (TSS) protects the pump from dry-running damage. IPX5 waterproof body effectively prevents water ingress problems. Dual safety locks (trigger lock + wheel brake) ensure secure operation, especially be friendly for homes with kids or pets

【Accessories Include】Comes with 4 quick-connect nozzles (0° pinpoint jet, 15° high-pressure, 25° general wash, 40° wide spray), 1 high-pressure foam cannon, 1 spray gun, and 1 nozzle-cleaning brush. All accessories ship pre-packaged with the pressure washers—plus an installation toolkit for full setup in under 3 minutes

【3-Year After-sales Guarantee】We provide 3-year after-sales service covering the cleaning machine and replaceable parts, excludes accidental damage or misuse. Additionally fast exchange and reissue surpport from US warehouse, and professional after-sales team provides lifetime technical support

【Space-Saving & Easy Storage】A cord reel on the right keeps the power cable neatly wrapped, while rear-mounted hose hooks and a left-side spray gun holder keep accessories organized. With a compact 14"×13"×16.5" footprint, it tucks effortlessly into tight spaces like garage shelves or apartment closets

name: Electric Pressure Washer, Foam Cannon, 4 Different Pressure Tips, Power Washer, 3800 PSI 2.4 GPM
short_description: 💦[Outstanding Performance] Generates up to 3800 PSI of water pressure and 2.4 GPM of water flow for handling even the most stubborn grime quickly and effortlessly. N-COR pump is durable, non-corrosive and maintenance-free. 2 year warranty.

💦[Snow Foam Lance] Directly sprays foam. Cleansers don't pass the pump for longer pump's life so you can use chemicals like bleach, vingar and etc. Thicker and dense foam stays on the surface longer for better cleaning performance.

💦[4 Universal Tips] The 0° tip delivers super high pressure for dissolving stubborn substances on hard surface. The 15° tip delivers high pressure for concrete and bric with hard surface. The 25° tip delivers medium pressure for wood decks, viynl sidings with soft surface. The 40° tip provides low pressure for windows and screens with fragile surfaces.
💦[Effortless Assembling] Assembled in minutes for easy to use.
💦[Suck] Sucks water from container if without any water tap. Garden hose connector size 3/4 inch
